name: Phantom Trigger
description: Phantom Trigger is a Hardcore Neon Slasher with RPG elements. Figure out what's real as you follow the story of Stan on a journey through surreal and twisted worlds.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and up Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core Memory: 2000 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce GT 650M / Radeon R9 M375 or higher graphics card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 700 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9 compatible Additional Notes: xBox gamepad is recomended
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and up Processor: i5 or better Memory: 4000 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 / Radeon R7 360 or higher graphics card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 700 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9 compatible Additional Notes: xBox gamepad is recomended
